thread.title: In Pics: Team India gets warm reception at Lucknow Airport ahead of Kanpur ODI
thread.title_full: In Pics: Team India gets warm reception at Lucknow Airport ahead of Kanpur ODI

title: In Pics: Team India gets warm reception at Lucknow Airport ahead of Kanpur ODI
text:
Updated: Saturday, October 10, 2015, 18:00 [IST] Facebook Twitter Google+ Comments Mail 
Lucknow, Oct 10: When team India 's players reached Lucknow for the upcoming series, crores of people welcomed them on the Amausi airport . Not only Indian players, even the South African players got a warm welcome by the people on the airport. 
After reaching the Lucknow airport, the players left for Kanpur where the first match of the series will be played. When players arrived at the Landmark hotel in Kanpur, crowd gave MS Dhoni and company a grand and warm welcome. 
1st ODI preview ; Ind-SA series guide 
Team India is under pressure to perform following T-20 series loss against an upbeat South Africa . 
Earlier yesterday, fans gathered outside the Green Park stadium in huge numbers to purchase tickets for the ODI rubber.
